session_summary.objective: Advance the setup and development of the DripSim project, a 3D farm simulator set in the sub-médio São Francisco region, focusing on irrigated fruit farming (mango and grape) using Unity 3D and C#.

activities.description: Reviewed the folder structure in C:\Users\Campo\Desktop\dripsim, including dripsim_game (Unity project), dripsim_assets, dripsim_docs, and files like folder_content.txt. Confirmed dripsim_game contains standard Unity folders (Assets, ProjectSettings, etc.) and SampleScene.unity.

Set up Git repository in the root directory (dripsim) to include dripsim_game, dripsim_assets, and dripsim_docs. Provided updated .gitignore (artifact_id: fb26a437-51af-4ebd-b320-d81fe14f9497) and .gitattributes (artifact_id: 817d0067-2042-442d-8210-8b69b571e3fe) to handle large files (.blend, .psd, .tiff) with Git LFS. Adjusted .gitignore and .gitattributes to support Blender and 2D art files in dripsim_assets.

Confirmed that .csproj, .sln, and similar files are generated in dripsim_game (Unity project root) and are correctly ignored by the global patterns in .gitignore (*.csproj, *.sln). No prefixes (dripsim_game/) needed for these patterns.

Generated a README.md file (artifact_id: b5821e41-03f2-4917-8a85-aa71a2467e50) for the dripsim repository, describing the project, repository structure, setup instructions (including Git LFS), and contribution guidelines. Prepared for GitHub integration.

Provided instructions to create a GitHub repository, link the local repository (git remote add origin), and push the committed changes. Ensured Git LFS is ready for large files. Confirmed the repository is locally committed but not yet pushed to GitHub.

Configure the terrain in dripsim_game/Assets/Scenes/SampleScene.unity with semi-arid textures.
Create prefabs for drippers, mango, and grape plants in dripsim_game/Assets/Prefabs or dripsim_assets.
Add .blend models to dripsim_assets and export as .fbx for Unity.
Implement UI with UI Toolkit for resource management (water, seeds).
